title: Eat That Frog Not! Use hsbc Time Management Approach
description: This mini e-book challenges at least 2 centuries old perception of time management known as “eat the frog” first. This implies that one should finish the hardest task as first thing in the morning. Unfortunately this approach has brought limited success to limited people until now whereas, it has left majority of people frustrated and fatigued. They have started hating their jobs and lives. The new rebel approach known as hsbc is introduced in this e-book. It helps you to finish your tasks with more human friendly and self-oriented approach. It not only makes you love your job but also helps increase your productivity, happiness level and eventually level of creativity.
author: Azhar  Ali
